dialog.title: Manage Book Import
dialog.dontShow: Don't show this window on startup

notifications.selectBooks: Please select at least one book to import

ownershipManager.title: Manage Ownership for Recipe Books
ownershipManager.explain: Set ownership for recipe books. The ownership will apply to all recipes in the book with a difficulty less than or equal to the "Max DC" value. For others, the status will be set to "Default".
